name: Couch Surfer (Minotia)
description:
** IMPORTANT NOTE** 

Downloadable game!

Download Button is at the bottom of this wall of text!

**IMPORTANT NOTE**

Game Developed for PIMA Game Design Spring Class of 2021 Game Jam 03.

Ever had a bad day? Well, today was one of those days... and you're now home and just want to watch some stuff on your brand new TV. This TV comes with a whopping 6 channels!

-Goal-

Get your spirits back up by watching some awesome TV!

-Avoid-

Pesky news channels that seem to constantly show up right at the good part of the show.

-Controls-

Very simple to change the channel!

Number Keys (1), (2), (3), (4), (5), (6) 

--Known Issues--

Rapidly changing channels prior to the pesky news channel shows up will greatly increase its frequency of showing up. Making the game a tad bit harder...

---Credits---

-Room Design-

Made in Adobe Illustrator by Blake Gustafson

-Animation clips-

All clips were made in Adobe Animate by Blake Gustafson

-Programming-

All done by Blake Gustafson

-Music-

All music acquired from YouTube Audio Library.

Channel 1: "Simple" by Patrick Patrikios

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCTPI2hZYxoHtdGEpdFoaU5A

Channel 2: "Pan's Labyrinth" by Josh Pan.

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UClQhr93XlKAt3QvRV8VuCeg

Channel 3:" Vishnu" by Patrick Patrikios

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCTPI2hZYxoHtdGEpdFoaU5A

Channel 4: "Lights" by Patrick Patrikios

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCTPI2hZYxoHtdGEpdFoaU5A

Channel 5: "Brass Orchid" by Bobby Richards

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCT5LDJ8VYAKfY2e8dExo2Cw

Channel 6: "Glacier" by Patrick Patrikios

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCTPI2hZYxoHtdGEpdFoaU5A

--Key Takeaways--

This game is not perfect! What I am truly happy about however is that everything was made by me.

*"Besides the music!"*
